casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Charles CLAY, Defendant-Appellant. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Charles Clay, Defendant-Appellant. People of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Charles Clay, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 157884, SC: 157885, SC: 157886
COA: 335179, COA: 335395, COA: 336828 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 30, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the April 24, 2018 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
